article.title: Evaluation of Indexing and a Technique for Formalized Search RequestStatement
article.author: Frants, Yu. I.Voiskunskii, V. G.Mukosei, V. I.Kozhina, T. G.
article.text: A method for evaluation of indexing is expounded. The feasibility is examined of using marked documents instead of requests, called the "beacon method".. A M-algorithm for formalized statement of search requests is described and exemplified by an information retrieval system in the nitrogen industry..
